gentleReminder.title: A gentle reminder
gentleReminder.body: In life, we don't always get to choose our child. Sometimes the world hands us a little human to love just as they are. Consider continuing the journey with the kid you've got — you might be surprised where it goes.

announcement.title: Hi! Just a quick Thank You!
announcement.body1: Since launching in May, I've been amazed to see over 20,000 babies raised by players from all over the world. Hearing your wonderful stories and experiences has been a true highlight for me.
announcement.body2: I've just updated the website with Gemini and am continuing to make improvements to give you the best experience possible.
announcement.body3: If you have any feedback or just want to share a story, please feel free to email me - I'd love to hear from you. Thank you again for playing, and I hope you enjoy the journey with your little one!

share.title: I've raised {{childName}} to 18 at the Baby Simulator!
share.text: Join me and try raising a baby yourself at https://babysim.fun!

welcome.title: The Baby Simulator
welcome.subtitle: A text-based game about the parenting journey from birth to adulthood
welcome.savedGameGreeting: Hello! We found an ongoing game:
welcome.continueOrNew: You can continue this game or start a fresh game.
welcome.gameIntroText1: In this game, you will play as a parent raising your baby until 18 years old.
welcome.gameIntroText2: Each year you will face a parenting choice that will deeply affect your child's personality, interests, and future development.
welcome.feature1: AI-generated character backgrounds, parenting scenarios, and storylines
welcome.feature2: Every decision affects your child's path
welcome.feature3: See a timeline of your parenting journey until your child reaches adulthood at 18, and reflect on what kind of parent you are
welcome.feature4: Generate a photo of your 18-year-old child in the style you prefer
welcome.feature5: Upgrade to Gemini 3.0 Pro for better scenario generation and writing
welcome.startGameInfo: Click start game to randomly generate a parent character and basic child information.
welcome.specialRequirementsPlaceholder: I want an ugly cute kid

specialRequirementsPlaceholderByStyle.realistic: I want an ugly cute kid
specialRequirementsPlaceholderByStyle.cool: My baby will become a unicorn startup founder
specialRequirementsPlaceholderByStyle.ultra: Please share as much details about you and your partner (if have) as possible for an ultra realistic experience.

welcome.specialRequirementsDesc: You can describe what you'd like for yourself or your baby. AI will try to meet them. (Of course, AI can sometimes be unpredictable too, just like babies...)
welcome.readyToStart: Ready to take on the challenge to become a parent?

intro.birthStory: After fierce competition among 300 million sperm and dozens of follicles, plus a long and arduous ten-month pregnancy, your baby has finally decided to come into the world, ready to challenge you with the sweetest yet most painful experience!

info.title: Information Center
info.wordsFromDevelopersContent:
Hi there!
Thank you for playing The Baby Simulator. I created this simple text-based game after watching many of my friends - people my own age - embark on parenthood and face firsthand the joys, surprises, and challenges of raising a child. Through this simulator, I hope to give players a small glimpse into the difficult choices, sweet milestones, and sometimes unexpected hurdles that come with caring for a little one.
It's also extra fun to play with someone else! Debating each tough question together can be a fast (and often hilarious) way to discover whether you'd make great co-parents in real life.
I poured my own curiosity, respect, and a touch of empathy into every scenario, and your feedback and stories are what keep this project growing, so please don't hesitate to share your thoughts or suggestions.
Happy parenting (in simulation),
— pearyj
info.privacyContent:
1. Information We Collect
No personal data: We do not collect or store names, email, IP addresses, or any other personally identifying information without explicitly asking for your consent.
We may collect aggregate anonymous statistics and anonymous crash reports solely to improve stability.

2. Gameplay Analytics & Optional E-mail Association
What we collect –
• Gameplay interaction data (choices made, session length, feature usage, crash logs, device type, and coarse location such as country/region).
• E-mail address only if you voluntarily submit it.
How we use it –
We use the data solely to analyse behaviour patterns and improve BabySim's design, stability and content. We never sell or share it with third-parties outside our analytics/service providers.
Legal basis –
• EU/UK GDPR: your consent (Art. 6 (1)(a)) when you provide the e-mail, and our legitimate interest (Art. 6 (1)(f)) in improving the game when we process de-identified gameplay data.
• US California (CPRA/CCPA): we do not "sell" or "share" this information. If that changes, you will see a "Do Not Sell or Share My Personal Info" link.
Your controls –
• Opt-out or withdraw consent at any time from in-game settings or by e-mailing dev@babysim.fun.
• Request access, correction, or deletion of your linked data.
Security –
Data in transit is encrypted (TLS 1.2+); data at rest is encrypted and access-controlled to authorised staff only.

3. How We Use Information
To diagnose and fix bugs, and to understand overall usage patterns (e.g. how many sessions per day).

4. Cookies & Tracking
We do not use cookies or third-party trackers.

5. Data Retention
Anonymous logs and crash reports are retained for the duration needed to help improve and maintain the Game.

6. Third-Party Services
We do not share any data with third parties other than our data analytics service providers.

7. Children's Privacy
We do not knowingly collect information from anyone under 13. If you are under 13, please play with parental guidance.

8. Changes to This Policy
We may update this Policy; changes take effect when posted.
info.termsContent:
1. Acceptance of Terms
By accessing or playing The Baby Simulator (the "Game"), you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service ("Terms"). If you do not agree, do not access the Game.

2. Description of Service
The Game is a free, browser-based, text-only simulation of raising a virtual baby. No user accounts or saved progress; each session is ephemeral.

3. Eligibility
You must be at least 13 years old (or have parental permission). By playing, you represent that you meet this requirement.

4. User Conduct
You agree not to:
• Reverse-engineer, decompile, or hack the Game.
• Use the Game for any unlawful, harmful, or harassing purpose.
• Interfere with the Game's operation or with other users' enjoyment.

5. Intellectual Property
All Game content (text, code, graphics) is © 2025 by The Baby Simulator. You may not copy, modify, distribute, or create derivative works without our prior written consent.

6. Changes to Service
We may modify, suspend, or discontinue the Game (or features thereof) at any time, with or without notice.

7. Changes to Terms
We may update these Terms. The "Last updated" date will change; your continued use after that date constitutes acceptance of the new Terms.

8. Governing Law
These Terms are governed by the laws of Singapore, without regard to conflict-of-law principles.

9. Analytics
The Game collects gameplay analytics as described in the Privacy Policy. If you choose to supply an e-mail address, you expressly consent to the Game associating the analytics with that address for internal product-improvement purposes. No analytics derived from linked data will be sold, licensed or disclosed to third parties except our vetted service providers acting on our behalf.
info.disclaimerContent:
Entertainment Only
The Baby Simulator is an interactive experience for entertainment purposes only. It is not professional parenting, medical, legal, or psychological advice.

"As-Is" Provision
The Game is provided "as-is" and "as-available." We make no guarantees about its accuracy, reliability, or suitability for any purpose.

Limitation of Liability
We shall not be liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, or consequential damages arising from your use of the Game.

Age Guidance
Recommended for ages 13+. Some scenarios may reference caregiving stress or emotional challenges.

Third-Party Links
If the Game links to external sites, we are not responsible for their content or privacy practices.

paywall.emailRequired: Email is required for receipts and for tracking your credits
paywall.emailInvalid: Please enter a valid email address
paywall.paymentSecure: Payment securely processed by Stripe. Note that Stripe takes a 2.9% + 30 cents fee for each payment so please choose a higher amount in one transaction if you'd like to generate multiple times! You will be able to reuse them in the future with your email address.
paywall.paymenttestnotice: Note that as we are currently in testing and are giving away credits for free, please put in 4242424242424242 as the credit card number, and you will receive credits without charging your real card.

paywall.creditsFound_llm_plural: You have {{count}} credits. You can continue with Gemini 3.0 Pro now.
paywall.noCreditsFound: No credits found. Please donate to get credits.
paywall.emailReceiptCopy: Share your email for receipt and for recovering your image credits for future kids
paywall.emailAgreement: By sharing your email you agree to our Privacy Policy and Terms of Service.
paywall.emailPrivacyNotice: Privacy notice – By providing your e-mail you agree that BabySim may link it to your gameplay activity solely for analytics and product-improvement in line with our Privacy Policy. You can unlink or delete this data at any time.
paywall.postPaymentReminder: If the page doesn't refresh after payment, you can return to this website in the same browser and your credits should load automatically. If you encounter any issues with payments, please email dev@babysim.fun.
paywall.premiumAccessWarning: Important: Gemini API availability varies by region. Before donating, make sure your account can access Gemini. The image generation feature is not subject to this restriction.
